amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that air carriers should provide special fares to members of the armed forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 813 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 813 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S6898; text: CR S6898) To express the sense of the Senate that air carriers should provide special fares to members of the armed forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 813 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 813 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison.
